title: Kingdom of Nain
description: Young adult Christian fiction. One girl's journey to become best friends with God.When Elisha prays to make God her best friend, she finds herself in a mysterious kingdom with angels and a golden lamb. The angels give Elisha five ancient scrolls. Each has a secret that will bring her closer to God. But time is running out. A mysterious man is plotting to close the doors to the kingdom, and tempt her onto a darker path. What are the five secrets? Can Elisha complete her mission before the man intervenes? And what will happen if she does succeed?Illustrated by award winning designer Michel Le.ALL profits from the book are used for donating free copies to children in need, and for book promotion.
author: Christine Le
